data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Kortrijk with the kick-off.
Jean Onana (Mouscron) sees red and is sent off in Kortrijk!
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Guldensporenstadion.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Mouscron kick-off.
Eric Ocansey (Kortrijk) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 52, Ilombe Mboyo (Kortrijk) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Fernando Da Cruz is making the team's first substitution at Guldensporenstadion with Imad Faraj replacing Beni Badibanga.
Goal! Kortrijk have got their heads in front thanks to a Ilombe Mboyo strike.
In the minute 63, Kortrijk move into a 2-0 lead through a Gilles Dewaele header.
Deni Hocko is booked for the away team.
The away team replace Harlem Gnohere with Marko Bakic.
In the minute 70, Kortrijk make their first substitution with Michiel Jonckheere replacing Julien De Sart.
The home team have replaced Ilombe Mboyo with Jovan Stojanovic. This is the second substitution made today by Yves Vanderhaeghe.
Fabrice Olinga is replacing Eric Junior Bocat for the away team.
In the minute 83, Great finish from Eric Ocansey to give Kortrijk a 3-0 lead.
He's off! Deni Hocko is shown a second yellow card.
Yves Vanderhaeghe (Kortrijk) is making a third substitution, with Habib Gueye replacing Eric Ocansey.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-0.
